document_data.name: Council of Merchants
document_data.mainbody: The '''Council of Merchants''' were the rulers of the [[Shining Lands]].
document_data.Organization:
The [[Elf|eleven]] wealthiest merchants within the Shining Lands comprised the Council of Merchants. This was determined by simple arithmetic. Those with the most income were awarded seats. Because of this, at least a few council seats changed hands on a yearly basis. 

As of [[1367 DR]], [[Kara Jeratma]] was the head of the council; a position her family held since her great-grandfather [[Jeradeem]].

Aside from the main Council, each city within the Shining Lands had their own version of the Council of Merchants consisting of the eleven richest merchants within that particular city.
